div.p: An extension to backport Timing.repeat.timeOfDay (http://hl7.org/fhir/2017Jan/datatypes-definitions.html#Timing.repeat.timeOfDay) for use in DSTU2.

description.value:
Specified time of day for action to take place.
A backport of Timing.repeat.timeOfDay (http://hl7.org/fhir/2017Jan/datatypes-definitions.html#Timing.repeat.timeOfDay) for use in DSTU2.

requirements.value: A need to represent the specific time of day.

definition.value: Specified time of day for action to take place.

comments.value: When time of day is specified, it is inferred that the action happens every day (as filtered by Timing.repeat.dayOfWeek) on the specified times. The elements when, frequency and period cannot be used as well as timeOfDay.
